product_name: The North Face Hedgehog IV GTX XCR Hiking Shoes - Men's
long_description: The Hedgehog IV GTX XCR Hiking Shoes from The North Face offer lightweight construction, a stout, supportive fit and waterproof protection to keep feet as happy as a hedgehog on the trail. Synthetic leather uppers with nylon mesh panels are flexible, lightweight and durable for breathable, comfortable use on the trail. Seam-sealed GORE-TEX(R) XCR(R) inserts with wicking nylon linings offer waterproof protection while allowing moisture vapor to escape. Reinforced toe boxes and molded rubber heel counters protect uppers from abrasion; gusseted and padded tongues keep out debris and add comfort. Removable EVA footbeds feature forefoot and heel cushioning pads and built-up heels for enhanced support. Dual-density EVA midsoles deliver all-day cushioning and shock absorption; heels feature a stiffened cradle to help center your heel and enhance stability. Thermoplastic urethane shank plates add torsional rigidity and protection from uneven terrain. The Hedgehog IV GTX XCR Hiking Shoes feature aggressive Vibram(R) rubber outsoles to supply dependable traction on uneven terrain.
short_description: The Hedgehog IV GTX XCR Hiking Shoes from The North Face offer lightweight construction, a stout, supportive fit and waterproof protection to keep feet as happy as a hedgehog on the trail.
